name: Calculator JB
description: Calculator JB is a customizable version of the Calculator app included on Android Jelly Bean (Android 4.3)  Our goal is to allow any Android phone or tablet can enjoy this simple calculator!   --- FEATURES ---  - Simple calculator - Configurable style & colors - Compatible with Android 2.2+ - Support for Samsung Multi-window (S3,S4,Note 2,...) - Ad-free   If you want to help us to continue working on this project you can purchase Clock JB+, Camera ICS+ or Camera JB+ app.  Please contact us at moblynx.us@gmail.com if you have any problem. We are delighted to receive any feedback.  Thanks for your support!  Android is a trademark of Google Inc.
